post.author: 강동욱
post.content:
이거 한국에서 링크 해도 이렇게 빠른지는 모르겠군요.
한국에서 들어 오시는 분 의견좀 ...

>I was very impressed with the response time when I clicked.
>It's fast and I know there have been lots of efforts to improve our web-site. I appreciate you guys great effort and time.
post.title: [re] Wow! It\\'s fast! - 한국에서도?
